Yandex Disk.name: G04b.01
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company assess freedom of expression and information risks of enforcing its terms of service?

Yandex Disk.name: G04b.02
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company conduct risk assessments of its enforcement of its privacy policies?

Yandex Disk.name: G04b.03
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company assess discrimination risks associated with its processes for enforcing its terms of service?

Yandex Disk.name: G04b.04
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company assess discrimination risks associated with its processes for enforcing its privacy policies?

Yandex Disk.name: G04b.05
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company conduct additional evaluation wherever the company’s risk assessments identify concerns?

Yandex Disk.name: G04b.06
Yandex Disk.description: Do senior executives and/or members of the company’s board of directors review and consider the results of assessments and due diligence in their decision-making?

Yandex Disk.name: G04b.07
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company conduct assessments on a regular schedule?

Yandex Disk.name: G04b.08
Yandex Disk.description: Are the company’s assessments assured by an external third party?

Yandex Disk.name: G04b.09
Yandex Disk.description: Is the external third party that assures the assessment accredited to a relevant and reputable human rights standard by a credible organization?
